server._comment: Server runs on port 3000, proxied by Nginx

_instructions.step1: Copy base ID from Airtable URL (between app.../ and /tbl...)
_instructions.step3: Add all scopes and select your base
_instructions.step5: All other settings (API keys, images) are in Airtable Configuration table

_airtable_configuration._comment: These fields should be in your Airtable Configuration table:
required_fields: FAL_API_KEY - Your FAL.ai API key (get from https://fal.ai/)
Gemini_API_Key - Google Gemini API key (optional, for prompt generation)
num_images - Number of images per prompt (1-6)
Video_Duration - Video duration in seconds (5 or 10)
